law.catch_line: Duties of Geographic Information Advisory Council.

text.section: The Division of Geographic Information Systems shall provide necessary staff support services to the council. All cabinets, departments, divisions, agencies, and officers of the Commonwealth shall furnish the council necessary assistance, resources, information, records, or advice as it may require to fulfill its duties.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 11, effective July 12, 2012. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 13, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 36, effective June 20, 2005. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 506, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 536, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 327, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1994.
